Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.model

Class LogicBoardAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.batallanaval.model.LogicBoardAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILogicBoard, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LogicBoard
public abstract class LogicBoardAdapter extends Object implements ILogicBoard, Serializable
Abstract implementation of the ILogicBoard interface. This class provides base logic for managing the board in the Battleship-style game, including placing boats, tracking hits and misses, and checking for game over.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n
